channel.title: FlatWP Demo Content
channel.description: Demo pages for FlatWP headless WordPress starter

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:3:{i:0;a:5:{s:13:"acf_fc_layout";s:14:"hero_centered";s:7:"heading";s:39:"Build Modern Headless WordPress Sites";s:10:"subheading";s:98:"FlatWP combines WordPress's powerful content management with Next.js performance and developer experience";s:8:"cta_text";s:12:"Get Started";s:8:"cta_link";s:8:"/signup";}i:1;a:4:{s:13:"acf_fc_layout";s:13:"features_grid";s:7:"heading";s:25:"Everything You Need";s:10:"subheading";s:52:"Powerful features for modern headless WordPress";s:8:"features";a:6:{i:0;a:3:{s:4:"icon";s:8:"âš¡";s:5:"title";s:15:"Lightning Fast";s:11:"description";s:85:"Optimized for maximum performance with ISR, edge caching, and intelligent rendering";}i:1;a:3:{s:4:"icon";s:8:"ðŸŽ¨";s:5:"title";s:14:"Beautiful UI";s:11:"description";s:73:"Pre-built components using Shadcn UI and Tailwind CSS for rapid development";}i:2;a:3:{s:4:"icon";s:8:"ðŸ”’";s:5:"title";s:13:"Type Safe";s:11:"description";s:82:"Full TypeScript support with auto-generated GraphQL types for complete type safety";}i:3;a:3:{s:4:"icon";s:8:"ðŸ§©";s:5:"title";s:16:"Flexible Blocks";s:11:"description";s:79:"ACF Flexible Content integration for building custom page layouts in WordPress";}i:4;a:3:{s:4:"icon";s:8:"ðŸ“±";s:5:"title";s:19:"Mobile First";s:11:"description";s:77:"Responsive design patterns that work beautifully across all device sizes";}i:5;a:3:{s:4:"icon";s:8:"ðŸš€";s:5:"title";s:15:"Deploy Anywhere";s:11:"description";s:70:"Deploy to Vercel, Netlify, or any platform that supports Next.js apps";}}}i:2;a:4:{s:13:"acf_fc_layout";s:10:"cta_simple";s:7:"heading";s:24:"Ready to Get Started?";s:11:"description";s:71:"Join thousands of developers building amazing sites with FlatWP";s:8:"cta_text";s:18:"Start Building Now";s:8:"cta_link";s:8:"/signup";}}

a:3:{i:0;a:6:{s:13:"acf_fc_layout";s:10:"hero_split";s:7:"heading";s:39:"Building the Future of WordPress";s:10:"subheading";s:104:"We're on a mission to make headless WordPress accessible, performant, and delightful for developers everywhere";s:8:"cta_text";s:14:"Our Story";s:8:"cta_link";s:7:"#story";s:5:"image";s:0:"";s:14:"image_position";s:5:"right";}i:1;a:6:{s:13:"acf_fc_layout";s:15:"content_section";s:7:"heading";s:18:"Our Mission";s:7:"content";s:456:"

FlatWP was born from the frustration of building headless WordPress sites from scratch. We've spent years working with agencies and developers, and we noticed the same patterns repeating: setting up GraphQL, implementing ISR, creating reusable components, optimizing images, managing types...

We built FlatWP to be the foundation we wish we had. A production-ready starter that handles all the complex infrastructure so you can focus on building unique experiences for your clients.

";s:5:"image";s:0:"";s:14:"image_position";s:4:"left";s:8:"cta_text";s:0:"";s:8:"cta_link";s:0:"";}i:2;a:2:{s:13:"acf_fc_layout";s:12:"testimonials";s:7:"heading";s:27:"What Developers Are Saying";s:12:"testimonials";a:3:{i:0;a:5:{s:5:"quote";s:130:"FlatWP cut our development time in half. The architecture is solid, the documentation is excellent, and the performance is outstanding.";s:6:"author";s:13:"Sarah Johnson";s:4:"role";s:13:"Lead Developer";s:7:"company";s:12:"Digital Wave";s:5:"image";s:0:"";}i:1;a:5:{s:5:"quote";s:140:"Finally, a headless WordPress starter that doesn't compromise. Type safety, performance, and great DX out of the box. This is what we needed.";s:6:"author";s:11:"Mike Chen";s:4:"role";s:17:"Technical Director";s:7:"company";s:11:"BuildCraft";s:5:"image";s:0:"";}i:2;a:5:{s:5:"quote";s:125:"The ACF block system is brilliant. Our content team loves the flexibility, and our dev team loves the type-safe components.";s:6:"author";s:12:"Emma Rodriguez";s:4:"role";s:13:"CTO";s:7:"company";s:12:"ContentFirst";s:5:"image";s:0:"";}}}}}

Our team can build exactly what you need for your project";}i:2;a:3:{s:4:"icon";s:8:"âš¡";s:5:"title";s:25:"Performance Optimization";s:11:"description";s:85:"Make your site blazing fast with our performance audit and optimization services";}i:3;a:3:{s:4:"icon";s:8:"ðŸŽ“";s:5:"title";s:19:"Training & Support";s:11:"description";s:80:"Get your team up to speed with personalized training and ongoing technical support";}}}i:2;a:6:{s:13:"acf_fc_layout";s:15:"content_section";s:7:"heading";s:22:"Enterprise Solutions";s:7:"content";s:489:"

For larger organizations, we offer comprehensive enterprise packages that include:

  • Dedicated technical account manager
  • Custom SLA agreements
  • Priority feature development
  • Architecture consulting and code review
  • 24/7 emergency support
  • Multi-site deployment strategies

Our enterprise clients benefit from our deep expertise in WordPress, Next.js, and modern web architecture. We've helped Fortune 500 companies and fast-growing startups alike.
